price: 32. Na yango (Allah) alobaki: Oh lusufele! Mpona nini ozuami o motango mwa bagumbami te?
arabic: قَالَ يَٰٓإِبۡلِيسُ مَا لَكَ أَلَّا تَكُونَ مَعَ ٱلسَّٰجِدِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: qāla yāib'līsu mā laka allā takūna maʿa al-sājidīna
